response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. It's not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $12,000. Considering its exceptional qualities, I'm offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $15,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while recognizing your potential to appreciate its true worth.
